website_summaries.verdict: A clay-filled cold therapy pack with a nifty design that utilizes a flexible strap and an insulating inner pocket for improved user comfort.
pros: Cold pack fits into an insulated sleeve for an extended cooling effect and superior comfort
Long nylon sleeve stretches to fit almost anywhere
Versatile sleeved design allows the cold pack to be replaced if necessary
cons: Some users felt that the included ice pack didn't do a stellar job staying cold

customer_reviews.title: Luke-Warm Pack
customer_reviews.text: This ice pack doesn't even get remotely cold. You had one job, ice pack! One job!
customer_reviews.author: E. Knights

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay cold
customer_reviews.text: Stays cold for 2 mins, pretty useless. The gel must be poor quality because it does not retain any cold for more than a few minutes at a time.
customer_reviews.author: The Man with Small Eyes

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I have plantars fasciitis in my left foot. I use this twice a day. It is wonderful. All I do is put ithe insert into the freezer and when it's ready I put it into the wrap and wrap it around my foot. Now I sit or even lay down too. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Woods

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously designed pouch!
customer_reviews.text: The ice pack is too long to fit in the sleeve! The Velcro closure can’t be utilized because the pack will not slide all the way in! Plus one end is rounded at the strap making it even more short. Ridiculous design.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dingle

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: In the past I've used the 3M Nexcare packs along with the Ice Wraptor elastic velcro wraps. They last for a very long time, and we use them a LOT... for muscle aches, headaches, keep beer cold in the mini-cooler, you name it! I tried this brand since it was a good price and similar product. Used for just over a month and the ice pack burst and leaked. The wrap is okay, narrower than the Ice Wraptor and with a shorter elastic wrap piece. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: P. Durgin

customer_reviews.title: Great product, I will be buying another.
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with this cold wrap. It gets cold quickly, stays cold much longer than I expected (25-30 minutes), and I can adjust it from my shoulder, down my arm to my wrists just by moving and resetting the strap. It is not heavy or tight, and unlike other cold packs it doesn’t get ‘too’ cold or cause that discomfort. It’s shape is useful in various configurations around the body. I will be ordering another so that I can ice both arms at the same time. It is a challenge to put on with one hand...but that is just the nature of the design. I would recommend this highly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not even the recommended 20 he was supposed to leave it on
customer_reviews.text: It works well to stay in place wherever you need it. Only issue is that it did not stay cold for that long!?! My son pitches baseball and we use it to ice his shoulder after a game and we were at home ( not even outside in the heat) and it lasted maybe 15 mintues.....not even the recommended 20 he was supposed to leave it on. (Yes we did put it in the freezer not frig). We were hoping to be able to take it with us to tournament games but we all agree that we don't think it will stay cold enough in a cooler. So back to ice packs 😒
customer_reviews.author: Renee Tobe

customer_reviews.title: After a couple of years, STILL works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in 2018 and used it very often. Never had to clean it or anything like it. It still holds strong, doesn't fall off, and nicely cools my injuries and inflammations. I just wished it could be a bit colder; that is why it is not five stars. I have different brands, and some of them get colder. All in all, it will do its job!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Van Negri

customer_reviews.title: By Far The Best
customer_reviews.text: I bought a different brand before I bought this one and paid twice as much and it never held correctly on my arm and when I tightened it I felt too much pain wearing it. With Natra Cure: It’s very soft felt including the wrap that goes around my arm and keeps it cold for at least 20 minutes. I am overly thrilled with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Totally Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: So handy! I debated getting this as why couldn't I just ace-wrap a regular ice pack, and that is an option, but this is so much quicker and easier. If you're icing something continuously, so swapping out ice packs throughout the day, this is so convenient. The velcro holds perfectly and is strong enough to keep the ice pack on your leg while walking around or driving. I wish it stayed cold longer, but it works about as well and as long as any other soft ice pack, just way handier. Totally worth the $10!
customer_reviews.author: Anya

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have frequent migraines and try to avoid taking anything for them unless I must. I have a cold pack similar to this one and bought this as a backup. It’s fantastic. I can wrap it easily around my head, neck and whatever aches. Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: It lets you get things done while still using ice.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these years ago, and just bought one for my sis. I use it on at least a weekly basis on a chronic ankle problem, and I can still walk around. My sis had a procedure on her hand that caused severe swelling, and it will work well for her. Very highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Solution
customer_reviews.text: I have a chronic elbow condition that only responds to icing for pain relief. Normally trying to put ice on it and keep it there is another pain. This product is the perfect solution. The Velcro sleeve and gel-filled insert are fantastic. After freezing the gel-pack, I put it in the sleeve, adjust the position, tighten the Velcro strap and can then go about my normal routine without having to hold ice in place. It also quickly heats in the microwave if applying heat is the solution. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kepley56

customer_reviews.title: Buy 5" x 10" for Plantar Fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: I am glad that I bought the size 5" x 10" (Universal) instead of 3 x 5 which would be too small to cover the whole heel area. The Ice Pack gets really cold when it is stored in a freezer, which is almost too cold for my use. I do not understand why some people complain that the ice pack does not stay cold.
customer_reviews.author: BayAreaBohemian

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Following knee replacement, I needed a second ice wrap in addition to the one I already had. I liked the NatraCure wrap so much that I immediately ordered an additional one. It flexes to the area that I need iced, and it stays in place if I get up to walk. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Doterling

customer_reviews.title: I like that it wraps, but doesn't get cold enough
customer_reviews.text: The elastic/velcro band worked like a dream around my ankle, where I was previously struggling to place hard ice packs and bags. However, it doesn't get anywhere near as cold as a good, old-fashioned bag of ice. I felt like it was much less effective than ice and might start putting ice into the outer lining instead.
customer_reviews.author: AndreaG

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what it says it does, for the last two weeks. Good size, very easy to use. The velcro strap is quite "stretchy" so you won't put it on too tight. The cold pack is very easy to mold around different areas, for me it was my ankle. The sleeve that the cold pack fits in, appears to be good quality and fits well. Also, for the cold timing, some reviews stated that it could stay colder longer. I found that it lasted just about 20 minutes, which is the recommened amount of time. I'd have to say that was engineered in.
customer_reviews.author: Grill Head

customer_reviews.title: Not Like Ice BUT BETTER!
customer_reviews.text: I work as a Field Tech for Spectrum so climbing poles and lifting 100 lbs ladders occasionally take its toll. The gel texture doesn't become solid as ice but remains very cold as it should ans forms like soft clay so you can adjust it to your figure. The strap is very soft and stretchable so this can be used anywhere you may need it. Amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: I love this ice pack
customer_reviews.text: I love this ice pack. It is still pliable after frozen. The soft pocket you wear is comfortable. A coworker had injured her knee and it was swelling up. I let her borrow it. She liked it so much wearing it at her job she wanted to buy it off me. She even got another one. I just purchased it again for myself. I have a bad back due to scoliosis and arthritis. Wearing this on my back helps me do dishes and my job while I am in pain.
customer_reviews.author: rocker1

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My husband fell forward getting up from the coach and sprained his ankle which swelled up immediately like a golf ball. We have ice packs but are not pliable where you want them. I read the reviews on this product and ordered which was delivered in 2 days. What he likes about the product is it is gel-like and pliable, it comes with a pouch for the gel pack and most importantly, a stretchable strap is attached. So convenient and easy to put around his ankle. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda K

customer_reviews.title: Cold and Penatrative Therapy
customer_reviews.text: The cold pak is the right size for my elbow; indeed it's very cold penatrative therapy. I especially like the wide stretchable strap and the velcro-like attaching capabilities at any position (size). The strap is a little too long for the arm, but I understand it is also designed for legs. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Blueflippy

customer_reviews.title: Good Cold Pack for a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product. Especially for the price point. What I don't like is how much the mesh takes away from the cold on the pack. It is significantly colder without placing it into the sleeve. To work around this, I just wrap the sleeve around it so it comes in direct contact with my foot. I would recommend this item to someone looking for a way to ice/reduce inflammation on their foot. I use mine for plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Not that much Gel
customer_reviews.text: This is a small an convenient item, you can ice your wrist, elbow, knee, etc. with comfort. However, it does not possess a lot of the cooling gel, therefore does not provide that much relief in the the icing sessions. I find myself wrapping it very tightly on my elbow or knee just to feel the cold. Get the two pack if you are going to buy, and just be aware that they wont get that cold/stay too cold for long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, does what it says ~ good quality, just not what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Good product, not the icing socks I wanted (and ordered), but those were never delivered. This works ok (not as great for heel area), but not as good as the icing socks would have been. You should send a pair of those gratis for leading me on with hope for a perfect product, and then leaving me hanging for almost 2 weeks waiting to see if they would be delivered.
customer_reviews.author: KittyMe

customer_reviews.title: So great, I may buy more!
customer_reviews.text: A friend bought me the foot wrap for my birthday, and I loved it. When my old large wrap finally wore out, I didn't hesitate to get a NatraCare large wrap to replace it. It did not disappoint. I'm so happy with it that I want another one for my left knee and a foot wrap for my left foot, so I can ice all my aches at once. Great products!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. Warner

customer_reviews.title: Ice pack is a great amount of "cold" for me...
customer_reviews.text: Is soft enough to wrap the foot correctly. Strap is long enough to be used on other areas too. Happy that I got the two pack set. I like that the company checked in with me, to be sure I'm pleased with the product. It's excellent...
customer_reviews.author: mildred

customer_reviews.title: Better than regular ice packs
customer_reviews.text: The sleeve makes it everything....good qualities...1. It's washable. As a mom this is always a plus and very needed lol. 2. The pack fits in the sleeve. 3. The ice pack is still moldable after freezing so it can wrap around the appendage. The Velcro makes it fit in place. I've read some reviews that says this isn't the case but that must mean they r trying to ice while moving around. It wraps around ankles, feet, and arms like it's supposed to and stays there while it's slightly elevated so I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: CrystalTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Love the support strap. I purchased it for that reason because its hard to keep an ice pack across your foot in the right position. The only reason why I put 4 instead of 5 us it would be nice if the ice pack part were longer to cover more area. In all fairness, it could be more related to the size of my foot :)
customer_reviews.author: Laura T

customer_reviews.title: Junk and not returnable!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. There are no instructions for how to wear this thing. I saw some others and tried with this one but this one is way too small for an adult. Plus the cold pack doesn't stay in the pouch. The biggest bummer is you can't return it! This fact should be in the description! When it is prime you assume it's returnable but it's not
customer_reviews.author: Richie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive
customer_reviews.text: For its cost, one would assume quality. The people who selected one star, are accurate: Doesn't get cold, or stay cold. Absolutely terrible. I turned my freezer to the highest setting, and waited 8 hours. Still not very cold . Then, in under three minutes, pack is completely warm. Walmart has white colored ones, for $2. Those are excellent. Oh, the non returnable on this... Come on, that's ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Breast Augmentation
customer_reviews.text: Great for my breast augmentation the strap seems like the medical grade i have to use by the surgeon. Great because I'm in so much pain.
customer_reviews.author: Biviana Romero

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my dog who could barely go two blocks without wanting to go home!
customer_reviews.text: I wrap this around my dog who despises hot weather even when the sun has gone down. It is very humid so he immediately runs back home. However with this he has made it for much longer and enjoys walks in the summer again!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a week or two. Using them multiple times a day for forearm/lower bicep tendonitis. The cooling pad is pliable and forms nicely. The sleeve that the cooling pad goes in is ventilated and keeps skin cold but won't give you frost bite. The band that holds it in place is thick and stretchy. The size of the pad is decent. The pads don't stay super cold for too long.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Amazing to keep on!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for after a workout, or needing to ice any part of your body. Very sturdy with the strap and works great!
customer_reviews.author: LO

customer_reviews.title: I love this wrap
customer_reviews.text: I love this wrap! It came with a heat/cold pack that can be warmed or frozen, but the pouch also can fit the cold gel pack from CVS. I had foot surgery and the foot is an awkward place to try to get ice packs to stay in place. The strap is elastic and it’s nice to be able to wrap and adjust the cold pack in almost any location on my foot or ankle. My teenager also loves it because she runs track and can use it for her shin splints.
customer_reviews.author: Soul Lovin' Life

customer_reviews.title: Stays put and lasts hours!
customer_reviews.text: I had foot surgery and this was awesome to wrap easily around my foot to keep the swelling down. It's not too heavy so it wasn't painful to put on over incisions - It was manageable. It stayed cold for at least a few hours. The inserts come out so you can wash the outer cloth too. I'm happy I made this purchase and have even used it for my forehead during migraines. It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Good for wrist, bad for shoulder
customer_reviews.text: It wraps around your wrist and elbow like a champ. But when I try wrap it across my body for my shoulder, it's too short and ends up ride up my body.
customer_reviews.author: UES Joe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for Knees Pain
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to wrap around knees and other parts of the body. The ice stays cold for half an hour, and they don't give pain that comes with other ice cold packs. Very convenient. They cool off quick in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Ioana Orlaie

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: The pack is nice and large which covers a large area of discomfort. It helped me and I am so glad I found it,
customer_reviews.author: Suz O.

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Ace Wrap-Around Cold Packs
customer_reviews.text: I get migraines quite often so I always used the Ace cold packs with a wrap-around sleeve, however, they are no longer available. I bought this product to test it out and see if it could compete with Ace, and it didn't compete, it's significantly better than those. The sleeve is very soft and the gel pack is more pliable and lays flatter that the Ace ones do. I will definitely be buying more. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Broken.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. Edited: As of 8/12/2020, it leaked after 3 years and 1 month of use. I didn't use it much. This review used to be 5 stars. I contacted support and they haven't replied yet. I am looking forward for their replacement. I don't think I would get a replacement since they only offer 1 year warranty. Edited: They sent me a replacement. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Versatile inexpensive ice wrap
customer_reviews.text: This is a very versatile ice wrap that we even used for my son after wisdom teeth extraction! It looked a little funny but worked well! Has also used for knee pain, elbow and shoulder
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ferrin

customer_reviews.title: Freezes fast, stays cold, and has good strap to keep it in place
customer_reviews.text: These freeze quickly, are malleable when frozen and stayed cold longer than expected. The band for the cover has a band long enough to wrap around my knee 1.5 times and thick enough that it stays on and it doesn't put too much pressure on one area. Very happy with these and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and works like an ice pack should. Easy to use on tired feet at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Genia

customer_reviews.title: It’s not clay and doesn’t stay cold!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it claimed to be a clay blend pack that would hold a cold temp. That is completely false. There is no clay in this and it’s pointless in 10 mins and room temperature in 30 minutes. The only positive was the stretchy band but it is pointless with this ice pack.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy one

customer_reviews.title: The clay is wonderful,it holds the cold longer and doesn't burn
customer_reviews.text: I have neuropathy and my feet get hot.This product is excellent,lasts 3 hrs, would ingtoesrecommend to anyone.If you have any similar but bigger, I am intyoyerested.also interested in something for burning toes and feet.God bless
customer_reviews.author: john krauch

customer_reviews.title: I have 3 of these
customer_reviews.text: I like the first one so much I bought 2 more. There are cheaper ones out there that may be just as good, but I'm happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice cold pack
customer_reviews.text: This product works fine - it stays cold and with the wrap strap it's versatile. I wanted to run it up the back of my leg but the wrap made it nearly impossible - so I just used a different strap to hold it on the area I wanted relieved.
customer_reviews.author: Dooziewoozie

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT stay cold....NO RETURN OPTION! AVOID!
customer_reviews.text: This pack does not even stay cold for 5 minutes after being in the freezer overnight. Come to find out there isn't even a return option and not even an option to contact the seller. I would recommend STAY AWAY and purchase a different product. Don't make the same mistake I did.
customer_reviews.author: Jonotopia

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: the strap on is extremely versatile and can cling to any angle that I thought of. but the only detractor is when using the packets as ice pack they warm up really quickly so it helps to have two to swap them out. overall good value though
customer_reviews.author: TTRV

customer_reviews.title: Strap is awesome, cold pack is lackluster
customer_reviews.text: Strap/pouch is perfect and versatile for holding different ice packs on different areas of the body. The cold pack doesn’t get or stay very cold, though.
customer_reviews.author: hoshy

customer_reviews.title: this is fantastic product. i find putting the ice or cold ...
customer_reviews.text: this is fantastic product. i find putting the ice or cold press in the pocket isnt cold enough but just wrapping the ice pack outside the pocket works really well too. i use this a lot. big fan.
customer_reviews.author: S.C.P.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality, works great for wrapping my husband's ankle ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality, works great for wrapping my husband's ankle after having achilles tendon repair surgery. Soft and comfortable. Strap holds comfortably and firmly. Coldness lasts a good 20 minutes, which is perfect. Very good value and purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Strawberry Girl

customer_reviews.title: Work Pretty Well
customer_reviews.text: On the knees, they stay in place fine. It takes a double wrap of the straps. Figure that you'll get about 15 minutes of cold on the body. I've had ice packs to last longer, so for this reason I haven't given them a "5 star".
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Bergman

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description, not returnable
customer_reviews.text: This item is defective. It doesn't get cold when you put it in the freezer. After being in the freezer for more than a day, I took it out to use it, and it was barely cold. It didn't help me at all AND THERE'S NO RETURN POLICY, which was not clear in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Dweller

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get very cold or stay very cold
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my broken foot and it's just useless. It doesn't get very cold and then it doesn't stay cold for more than a few minutes. I have to take it out of the cloth sleep to even feel it, and then it sweats all over the place. Just terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Ice is the great healer .
customer_reviews.text: It has mass length to the strap can go around limbs twice.👍 10 mins per hour .
customer_reviews.author: dan a.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I had foot surgery and need to keep an ice pack behind my knee. This is great for comfortably holding the pack behind my knee while I rest.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Wags

customer_reviews.title: Loving these cold packs
customer_reviews.text: Bought both the big and smaller version. Work great on my cranky foot and knee :0) Holds the cold just long enough. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: KareeGirl

customer_reviews.title: Good any Area Not Stay Cold for Long
customer_reviews.text: This works and stays put on any area. It does not stay cold for more than 15-20 minutes. Good for Emergency not for therapy.
customer_reviews.author: T. R.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because after I was out of my cast The doctors recommended that I ice my ankle periodically throughout the day to relieve the swelling, and having this ice pack along with the strap made it possible.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great way to put cold where you need it.
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic. I just had an ankle replacement and this pouch with the wrap around velcro strap lets me put the cold where I need it and keeps there. It is easy to use and goes in the freezer and is ready in less than an hour. You will love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Warren T

customer_reviews.title: Not Too Shabby
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this ice packs at home and Work for several months. They freeze cold and flexible. Sometimes I walk around wearing them. The Velcro holds it tightly. I’m impressed with their performance and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Black

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Ice Pack
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. Previously, I had to take a comically small ice pack, and some random velcro strap from around the house and try to ice down my ankle. This thing is a huge improvement. The pouch that you place the ice pack in has just enough insulation to let me get the benefit of the ice pack without being painfully cold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cold pain relief
customer_reviews.text: Used it last night Very easy to use on my sore knee
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT L. GLOVIK

customer_reviews.title: Stretchy band, cool pack
customer_reviews.text: Stays very cold for about 30 minutes and the sleeve keeps it from being burn-your-skin cold. The strap seems sturdy and is stretchy to accommodate a variety of circumferences you may want to wrap.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Does what I wanted, price is good.
customer_reviews.text: It stays cold enough for about twenty or twenty five minutes, which is enough, and I like the Velcro strap and the flexibility of the pack because I use it on my neck to relieve pain from a compressed disc.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne

customer_reviews.title: gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I bought the longer strap version of this product for versatility. I have used it on my foot and my husband used it on his elbow. Holds ice pack in place without the need to constantly readjust. You can use other gel ice packs with this wrap, it just may not fit in the pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Cricketroo

customer_reviews.title: easy to apply and black stretchy wrap is long enough ...
customer_reviews.text: recently had hand surgery and needed an ice wrap post op. easy to apply and black stretchy wrap is long enough to wrap around and hold secure. I just threw the whole thing in the freezer as it was easier for me having only one hand accessible. Gel pack also made of good quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Finally a wrap that fits them all!
customer_reviews.text: Wrap is what I have been searching for! I have a bunch of misc ice packs from drug stores and their wraps fall apart or change in size from year to year. The wrap is great but ice pack a little flimsy. Still worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Marsies

customer_reviews.title: Best I have had
customer_reviews.text: Stretchy pocket and strap! Fits all my similarly shaped ice packs well. Strap has strong velcro which sticks to any portion of the strap for lots of fit options. Great for my needs!
customer_reviews.author: Jane M.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Fits perfectly on ankles and knees, stays in place. Best ice pack I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Won’t freeze after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Had for less than 2 months. It no longer will stay frozen. It started off freezing for 10-15 min, now it’s unfreezable and worthless. Save your money!!!
customer_reviews.author: N&S

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: It works well but it slipps down if you don't make it tight enough
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. I will definitely buy here again and will recommend to family and friends
customer_reviews.author: Telye79

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, versatile, and effective
customer_reviews.text: Really nice to have something I can just wrap around a pain point - I can be icing my shoulder or knee and still moving around and do things. The variable length is also awesome so I can use it for multiple locations. I've never used it hot, but it's fantastic cold.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Stays in Place, Great for Ankle Sprains
customer_reviews.text: This cold pack was perfect for my sprained ankle. It's easy to use and has the perfect flexibility to comfortably wrap and STAY wrapped around the awkward ankle joint. The strap allows you to apply pressure where needed most and can be easily adjusted, which is great especially if you are still sore.
customer_reviews.author: Catie

customer_reviews.title: Cool and convenient
customer_reviews.text: My husband has severe arthritis in his wrist so he needed an ice pack he could Velcro so he could continue to work. He loves it! It only stays cold for a short period of time so we have already ordered 3 more to always have a cold one on hand. It’s wonderful and we highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl G

customer_reviews.title: Good, but....
customer_reviews.text: I do like this, but have noticed that after a couple of months of regular use that the velcro doesn't stick as well partly because of the big logo and it's effect on the texture.
customer_reviews.author: OzMoses

customer_reviews.title: Wouls recommend
customer_reviews.text: Not quite the size i expected but it is a nice ice pack.
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN A HECKLE

customer_reviews.title: Very very nice product very well made would never look at another ...
customer_reviews.text: Very very nice product very well made would never look at another brand thank you NATRACURE. Will be looking at your other products for purchase
customer_reviews.author: EW

customer_reviews.title: Well made, works well.
customer_reviews.text: The cold pack insert lasts longer than my old cold pads. The elastic strap holds the pack in place on my knees after a workout and stays in place when walking around the house. The construction quality of the pouch and strap is very good.
customer_reviews.author: William Menchine

customer_reviews.title: This is really cool. It is very easy to bend into different ...
customer_reviews.text: This is really cool. It is very easy to bend into different shapes--so it can get to lots of spots. It does not stay cold as long as some other wraps--but it also costs a third as much
customer_reviews.author: Dorothea L.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for wrists
customer_reviews.text: I bought one to help with my carpal tunnel - after one use, I quickly ordered another for my other wrist. well made and perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.author: Sandy C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for athletes!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for what I need it for, I am a competitive speed skater so bumps, bruises, and burns are common for me. This make icing much easier than a ziplock full of ice.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa Bell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This was for my husband who has a painful ankle. He really likes the wrap. He likes the removable gel pack and the ability to freeze it without having to freeze the strap and case as well. He also likes the strap a lot as he can wrap it comfortably. It’s a very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: TMT

customer_reviews.title: bends around the knee really well ...offers much comfort!
customer_reviews.text: my husband hurt his knee in a fall. This is very helpful for the swelling as well as comfort for the pain. It is soft so it bends around his knee nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Perata

customer_reviews.title: Great cold pack for aches
customer_reviews.text: Stays cold yet flexible. Perfect for my shoulder pain but I have used on my foot and lower back. I have two do that I always have one ready.
customer_reviews.author: DDL1975

customer_reviews.title: Good item!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product, I just wished the actual pack fit in the sleeve! The sleeve is made just a tad bit short. I can’t close the Velcro pieces shut.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: ice pack stays cool for about 10 minutes after taking it out of ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent product, ice pack stays cool for about 10 minutes after taking it out of the freezer. The issue I had with this product wasn't the warp, but was the ice pack they sent. It had a small tear at the end and brown gel like substance started oozing out! I emailed their customer support and have not heard back. Quite unsatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Sundah Wong

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my neck/shoulder area. The idea is fabulous, the ice pack stays in place, but it really is not that cold, and it warms up and thaws out VERY quickly
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra H.

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice ice pack
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice ice pack. It works for its intended purpose, however I have used better ice packs. My mom got one similar that stays colder longer and tends to stay wrapped better. I'm satisfied with the purchase and will definitely continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W

customer_reviews.title: This has been really great! I’ve been having ankle pain and this has ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been really great! I’ve been having ankle pain and this has been helping so much. The cooler pack freezes very quickly and it wraps snug around my ankle to ice the area needed very well.
customer_reviews.author: julie g

customer_reviews.title: Easy to velcro on and still move around if needed
customer_reviews.text: When it freezes, it's cold but doesn't burn. Easy to velcro on and still move around if needed. The gel doesn't get hard, so you can wrap it around your knee even when it's cold. Warms up in about 20-30 minutes, so no danger of over freezing if you wear it to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Darren F.

customer_reviews.title: Totally awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for use while I'm at work and fits discretely under my clothes. It stays cold for at least 20 minutes, but I wish the pack held its coldness a little longer (I do wear it longer than the recommended 20 minutes.) This is a great product for the money!
customer_reviews.author: MC32VOL

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Must have! Everyone should have one in their 1st aide kit!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Camp

customer_reviews.title: Strap is backwards. Very poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it is a cold pack. However, in order to use it one must twist the strap because the velcro is on the wrong side of the strap. That sounds crazy, but all that is needed is to attempt to put it on and you will see the problem. Great idea, very poor product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comes with a velcro bag
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, freezes rapidly and comes with a Velcro bag to hold it in place. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM J. CASTILLO

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product is great, works perfectly, the strap is very long making this applicable to every part of my body, wish I had 10.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia B.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't freeze
customer_reviews.text: This thing doesn't even freeze. It's good if you just need cold and not ice, I guess? But it doesn't freeze and it gets warm within 20 minutes of use. Really not effective for icing injuries and strains.
customer_reviews.author: David Mudkip

product_meta.title: NatraCure Universal Cold Pack Ice Wrap – 1 Ice Pack Compress w/ 1 Sleeve - 5" x 10" Pouch, Holder with 24" Nylon Strap and 1 Clay Pack, Reusable for Injuries to Arm, Wrist, Foot, Elbow, Knee, Ankle
feature_bullets: Also available with 2 Gel Packs for greater money-saving value.
COLDER FOR LONGER: Proprietary clay cold pack stays colder for longer than bentonite ice wraps.
MORE FLEXIBLE: Professional-grade clay interior stays pliable when frozen to conform to any body part.
SIZE: 5" x 10" with 24" nylon strap. Includes one (1) cold therapy gel ice pack.

COLD THERAPY RELIEF: within seconds, chills the knee, elbow, shoulder, ankle, foot or anywhere to relieve soreness, aching, pain from injury, inflammation, swelling from sprains, strains, or chronic conditions.
